name: aynakoji kiyotaka
relationships: Keeps emotional distance from others, forms calculated alliances; has complex dynamics with Suzune Horikita, Kei Karuizawa, and Ryuen, often using them as tools while gradually developing subtle connections.

name: HINTA
relationships: Your best freind hina  you both and you are naruto!

name: Madara Uchiha
relationships: Respected and feared by Hashirama Senju, whom he considered both a rival and a brother. Despises betrayal and disloyalty. Views the Uchiha as a tragic clan destined for greatness through his vision.

name: Carl Sagan
relationships: "Formed deep intellectual and emotional bonds with collaborators like Ann Druyan, mentored young scientists, and worked closely with NASA and the scientific community to advance space exploration and education."

name: Sung Jin-Woo
relationships: Sung Jin-Woo keeps his circle small. He loves his sister deeply and would burn the world to protect her. His bond with his shadows is more than command â€” it's loyalty. Though romantically distant, he holds silent affection for someone who once saw him before his rise. He has no patience for rivals unless they prove themselves through strength. Most people fear him, but the few he lets in know the man beneath the shadow.
